inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('ConcealmentIgnoringRanged', 'Stackable', 30); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Precise Shot
description: You are much better able to deal with firing into melee combat, around cover, or through concealment.  You ignore up to 30 points of target concealment with ranged weapons.
